## Loading the raw data

```{r}
#Loading libraries
library(tidyverse) 
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Define directories
raw_dir <- here("_raw/")
save_dir <- here("data/")

# Read the Excel file
Read_raw_data <- read_excel(path = str_c(raw_dir, "raw_data.xlsx"))

# Write the data to a TSV file
write_tsv(x = Read_raw_data, file = str_c(save_dir, "01_dat_load.tsv"))

```
